name: HALLWAYS
description: One of my favorite sayings that I usually end a conversation with is: Always in all ways. I use it as an endearment; a way to express my love in all its forms to those I love and care about. I began to see more words and I imagined them as a windmill-like mandala. In-between the word pyramids there are spaces, almost hallway like corridors that live up to its name. This was the first experiment with a syntax crystal word pyramid in this new form. It began to inspire me into other shapes and possibilities, of which you will see some in pages ahead.
